/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. Cars are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the scene. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day. The colors in the image are predominantly green and gray, reflecting the typical urban landscape of Beijing.
